price: Tukawapelekea Mtume miongoni mwao, kuwaambia: Muabuduni Mwenyezi Mungu! Hamna mungu asiye kuwa Yeye. Jee, hamwogopi?
arabic: فَأَرۡسَلۡنَا فِيهِمۡ رَسُولٗا مِّنۡهُمۡ أَنِ ٱعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنۡ إِلَٰهٍ غَيۡرُهُۥٓۚ أَفَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
footnotes: Tukawapelekea Huud. Naye ni katika wao. Tukawaambia kwa ulimi wake: Muabuduni Mwenyezi Mungu peke yake. Kwani nyinyi hamna Mungu anaye stahiki kuabudiwa asiye kuwa Yeye. Ni Yeye peke yake anaye faa mumwogope. Basi, jee mmeikhofu adhabu yake mkimuasi?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: fa-arsalnā fīhim rasūlan min'hum ani uʿ'budū al-laha mā lakum min ilāhin ghayruhu afalā tattaqūna
